citations.narrative:
There is a self feeding food receptacle in one outdoor enclosure, affecting 1 adult dog and 1 puppy, that has bird excreta
in the food. The self feeder did not have a lid that could protect the food from bird excreta. The licensee must provide a lid
to the self feeder or move it to a location that would protect the feed from being contaminated. The licensee must ensure
that all food receptacles are are constructed or located to minimize contamination by excreta, pests and protected from
rain and snow.
To be corrected by: 10 Dec 23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
3.9(b) 
   
Feeding 
There is a self feeding food receptacle in one outdoor enclosure, affecting 1 adult dog and 1 puppy, that has bird excreta 
in the food. The self feeder did not have a lid that could protect the food from bird excreta. The licensee must provide a lid 
to the self feeder or move it to a location that would protect the feed from being contaminated. The licensee must ensure 
that all food receptacles are are constructed or located to minimize contamination by excreta, pests and protected from 
rain and snow.  
To be corrected by: 10 Dec 23 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
 n
